name: Espada de Sheris
description:
Espada de Sheris is parkour 2D Platform game that tells the story of Kibo rescue crystals power stolen by Boss Stickers demon

How play:

Mouse left click = Attack Enemys and transition scenes

WASD = Move

Enter (return): Attack Enemy
